job_description:
Experience And Skill Set Requirements

Senior Developers: 2 roles

Leadership in Identity and Access Management (Entrust and OIAM) 40%
10+ years of experience with providing development support for COTS based identity and access Management systems including the following:
At least 4 years of experience related to Oracle Identity and Access Management Suite Plus.
At least 4 years of experience related to Entrust PKI products and Entrust Access Products.
At least 4 years of experience related to implementations with over 10,000 registered users.
Developing and Sustaining Large Applications 40%
10+ years of experience with designing, developing, deploying, and sustaining large application implementations based on the following technology products:
Web Tier: Windows Internet Information Server (IIS), IBM HTTP Server, Apache Tomcat
App Tier: IBM WebSphere, Oracle Directory Server Enterprise Edition DB Tier: Oracle database v11g and v12
O/S: Solaris, Windows, AIX and Linux.
Demonstrated knowledge and experience with ITIL processes such as Service Level Management, Problem Management, Change Management, Release Management, and Capacity Management.
Problem Solving 10%
10+ years of experience with triaging, analyzing, diagnosing (a.k.a troubleshooting), evaluating options, and resolving application problems including the following:
At least 4 years of experience related to Oracle Identity and Access Management Suite Plus.
At least 4 years of experience related to Entrust security products
At least 4 years related to troubleshooting problems related to non-production environments.
At least 4 years related to identity and access management solutions.
Quality Control and Assurance 10%
10+ years of experience with quality control and assurance methodologies and practices as applied to the implementation of applications with over 10,000 users.
Experience with Change Management and Release Management as processes supporting the implementation of large applications.
Experience with automated testing and development tools (e.g. Microsoft Team Foundation Server (TFS), Client Quality Centre (QC ALM), LoadRunner).
